meaning_str.bing:
n. 仪式；典礼；礼仪；礼节
网络. 婚礼；庆典

仪式；典礼；礼节；礼仪；庆典；仪式性活动；宗教仪式；正式场合的程序；礼貌；客套；庆祝活动

1.en: When Karen appeared at the ceremony with her red shoes, the minister advised her to wear black shoes instead of the red shoes.
1.cn: 当凯伦穿着那双红鞋子出现在仪式上的时候，牧师建议她把红鞋子换掉，穿黑色的鞋子。

2.en: At the opening ceremony, the head of the Commonwealth, Queen Elizabeth, said the organization had the opportunity to lead once more.
2.cn: 在开幕式上，英联邦国家的首脑及伊丽莎白女王表示，英联邦国家将再一次引领世界。

3.en: President Obama called it a "good day for America" this morning at a White House ceremony.
3.cn: 在今早的白宫发布仪式上，奥巴马总统称，“对美国来说这是个好日子。”

0.en: Because today is the grand opening ceremony for The Krusty Krab 2, where Mr. Krabs will announce the new manager.
0.cn: 因为今天就是克鲁斯 克莱伯餐馆二号的开幕仪式！仪式上，克莱伯先生将会宣布新的经理的名字。

1.en: You see, he's the Prince. Apparently they had some big ceremony before I was born.
1.cn: 他是个王子，显然，他们在我出生前有个大型仪式。

2.en: What's next, a commitment ceremony? Great. There's no room in your life for me anymore.
2.cn: 下一步是什么，承诺仪式？好吧，你的生活里已经没有我的位置了。

3.en: It's 2:00 a.m. What are you doing up? Nobel Prize acceptance ceremony streaming live from Stockholm.
3.cn: 凌晨两点钟，你还不睡在干嘛呢？从斯德哥尔摩直播的诺贝尔颁奖仪式。

4.en: It's gonna be great. There is a big ceremony and all the dads come and we pin on our badges.
4.cn: 那一定很棒，会举办一个大型的授章仪式，所有的爸爸都要出席为我们戴上徽章。

5.en: Great, well, who's it going to be? I'll do it, provided I can perform the ceremony in Klingon. No.
5.cn: 不错，那谁来当证婚人呢？我来吧，前提是得让用克林贡语主持仪式。没门儿。

6.en: We'll gather superheroes and leaders from all over the planet on our boat, the Everjust for a televised signing ceremony at sea.
6.cn: 我们要聚集全世界的领导人和超级英雄上我们的永远公正号在海上举行直播签字仪式。

7.cn: 再过一会儿就要开始了。

8.en: I mean you'd have the ceremony under this big beautiful arch.
8.cn: 应该在这个漂亮的拱门下证婚。

9.en: Wait a minute. She just made a scene in the middle of the ceremony.
9.cn: 她破坏了正在进行中的婚礼。

10.en: It's a shame you're joking. That'd be a lovely reading at our ceremony.
10.cn: 太遗憾你只是在挖苦了。不然本来很适合在我们婚礼朗诵呢。

11.en: You can put the aisle over here, and have the wedding ceremony right over here.
11.cn: 红毯可以铺在这边，然后在这边证婚。

12.en: How was school? Welcome, to the first ever in her life Maya refrigerator ceremony!
12.cn: 今天在学校怎么样啊？欢迎来到玛雅人生中第一个贴上冰箱的光荣时刻！

13.en: But he promised he'd come to my Explorers Ceremony to pin on my "Assisting the elderly badge".
13.cn: 不过他答应来参加我的探险颁奖礼，给我戴上 "帮助老人徽章"。

14.en: Yeah. Yeah, it's gonna be a small ceremony. Just family. His. Okay. Well, I'm really happy for you.
14.cn: 婚礼很简单，我们只邀请家人观礼，他的家人。好吧，我为你感到高兴。

15.en: So, we have the where and the when, but we still need to figure out who's going to do the ceremony.
15.cn: 地点和时间已经有了，就差婚礼的证婚人了。

16.en: Very well. And we will certify our dear friend James, with dignity. Give him a ceremony he deserves.
16.cn: 非常好，那么就让我们为亲爱的詹姆斯·威尔逊庄严送别，给予他应得的礼遇。

17.en: Anyway, I started working on what I'm going to say for the ceremony, do you wanna hear it? Okay. Yeah.
17.cn: 我已经写下我在婚礼要说的话，要听吗？好。

18.en: We're now in the ceremony, Monica is about to say, "I do" when her drunk uncle starts yelling. What do you do? Go.
18.cn: 婚礼举行到一半，莫妮卡正要说我愿意的时候，可是她的叔叔喝得烂醉，开始乱吼乱叫，你会怎么做？开始。

19.en: I think the marriage ceremony is about the same, but I have no idea how long the sacrificing of the straight men will take.
19.cn: 我想婚礼都大同小异，就是不知道直男愿意搭上多少时间。
